typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Group Code} as string,
		Description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SRCDiagnosisGroupCodes
SRCDiagnosisGroupCodes sink(input(
		ICD10DiagnosisGroupCode_KEY as integer,
		ICD10DiagnosisGroup_Code as string,
		ICD10DiagnosisGroupCode_Desc as string,
		CreationDate as timestamp,
		UpdationDate as timestamp,
		RecordCreationUserID as integer,
		RecordUpdationUserID as integer,
		ph_varchar1 as string,
		ph_varchar2 as string,
		ph_Decimal1 as decimal(10,2),
		ph_Decimal2 as decimal(10,2),
		ph_datetime1 as timestamp,
		ph_datetime2 as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		ICD10DiagnosisGroup_Code = {Group Code},
		ICD10DiagnosisGroupCode_Desc = Description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> SinkDiagnosisGroupCodes
